title: Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Ocean and Cliffs", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Rough waves in foreground with large dark cliffs at left in two sections.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Ocean and Cliffs", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-40.
